messages.title: A personal message for Broxtowe
messages.content: Dear Resident, [message content includes the candidate's priorities and vision for the constituency]

messages.title: The choice at the General Election
messages.content: David Cameron and the Conservatives offer a better future for you, your family and our country.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Offer record levels of employment and apprenticeships in Broxtowe. A strong economy also pays for great services like the NHS.
Best schools for all our children, Broxtowe's schools keep getting better without Labour aspirations on independence.
Keep on delivering our Green Belt, protect unique shops to fund and keep town centres vigorous and special.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour's Ed Miliband, SNP's Nicola Sturgeon, Green's Natalie Bennett, Liberal Democrats' Nick Clegg

issues.economy: Offer record levels of employment and apprenticeships in Broxtowe. A strong economy also pays for great services like the NHS.
issues.education: Best schools for all our children, Broxtowe's schools keep getting better without Labour aspirations on independence.
issues.environment: Keep on delivering our Green Belt, protect unique shops to fund and keep town centres vigorous and special.

housing.content: Keep on delivering our Green Belt.

politicalExperience.role: Member for Broxtowe and the High Street, Henry Morland
